directions.step:
Snap off tough ends of the asparagus. Remove scales if desired. Arrange asparagus in a vegetable steamer over boiling water. Cover and steam 4-minutes until crisp tender. Drain; arrange on a serving platter and keep warm. Melt margarine in a small saucepan over low heat; add almonds, and saute' until lightly toasted. Stir in marmalade; cook until heated. Spoon over asparagus. FROM: MICHAEL GROSZ (VBFF60A)
Recipe By :
